title: Reborn as a Transcendent - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Harem   Shoujo Ai   Xuanhuan   Yuri
tags: Adapted to Manhua   Arrogant Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Cultivation   Fearless Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Lucky Protagonist   Male to Female   MMORPG   Modern Day   Money Grubber   Nationalism   Overpowered Protagonist   Racism   Reincarnation   Ruthless Protagonist   Second Chance   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Virtual Reality   Wealthy Characters
author: Fēng huā   Mad Flower   疯花
description:
The global release of the first of its kind VRMMO is imminent, Yaeger had miraculously gone back in time, taking with him all the gaming experience and various strategies. He believed that he could rise to the summit and bring about the miracle of immortality. However, just when the game started…

Yaeger: “Wait, why the heck am I forcibly turned into a girl!!!”>
